name: variant_prompt
prompt_template:
You are reviewing {{ APPID }} ({{ title }}).
Industry: {{ industry|default('general', boolean=true) }}.
Summary: {{ summary }}.
Return JSON {"score": <0-1>, "comment": "..."}.

criteria.name: analysis
criteria.template: Evaluate {{ APPID }} for adoption in the {{ industry|default('general', boolean=true) }} sector. Return JSON {"score": <0-1>, "comment": "..."}.

criteria.name: prioritization
criteria.template: Rate priority (0-1) for {{ APPID }} focusing on the opportunity described as '{{ summary }}'.
